Literature.Title: Rationale-based, de novo design of dehydrophenylalanine-containing antibiotic peptides and systematic modification in sequence for enhanced potency.
Literature.Author: Pathak S, Chauhan VS

Literature.Title: Antifungal activity of novel synthetic peptides by accumulation of reactive oxygen species (ROS) and disruption of cell wall against Candida albicans.
Literature.Author: Maurya IK, Pathak S, Sharma M, Sanwal H, Chaudhary P, Tupe S, Deshpande M, Chauhan VS, Prasad R

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=5 µM,Human erythrocytes:12% Hemolysis=25 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC=5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 700699(MIC=25µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=39.06µM),Candida kefyr ATCC 2512(MIC=39.06µM),Candida glabrata ATCC 90030(MIC=312.5µM),Candida utilis ATCC 34438(MIC=19.53µM),Candida dubliniensis ATCC MAY-646(MIC=156.2µM),Candida tropicalis ATCC 750(MIC=19.53µM),Candida krusei ATCC 6258(MIC=19.53µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=39.06µM),Candida albicans Gu4(MIC=15.62µM),Candida albicans Gu5(MIC=15.62µM),Candida albicans F2(MIC=15.62µM),Candida albicans F5(MIC=15.62µM),Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=75.1µM),Aspergillus niger(MIC=>152µM),Fusarium oxysporum(MIC=152µM),Neurospora crassa(MIC=>152.73µM)
